Package cycling

Class RankRiders

java.lang.Object
cycling.CyclingPortalImpl
cycling.RankRiders
All Implemented Interfaces:
MiniCyclingPortal, Serializable
public class RankRiders extends CyclingPortalImpl
RankRiders covers the functions for ranking all riders, based on their overall race time.

    • rank

      public static HashMap<int[],LocalTime[]> rank(int stageId) throws IDNotRecognisedException
      Ranks the riders based on their times in the stage.
      Parameters:
      stageId - the ID of the stage.
      Returns:
      a HashMap of the sorted rider IDs and the accompanying sorted LocalTime[] array.
      Throws:
      IDNotRecognisedException

    • getRiderAdjElapTimeCopy

      public static LocalTime getRiderAdjElapTimeCopy(int stageId, int riderId) throws IDNotRecognisedException
      A copy of CyclingPortalImpl's getRiderAdjustedElapsedTimesInStage(). in order to avoid a cyclical inheritance.
      Parameters:
      stageId - the ID of the stage.
      riderId - the ID of the rider.
      Returns:
      the rider's total elapsed time.
      Throws:
      IDNotRecognisedException
